participant_1.background:
On my last vacation, I went to an arcade and played a lot of games, but I was scared when I saw a clown.
I like to wake up to the smell of fresh-brewed coffee.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I sometimes neglect my health due to my busy schedule.
i once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.

participant_2.background:
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.
i am divorced.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

content.text: Not much, just getting ready to start my day.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a personal trainer, I love helping people reach their fitness goals.
That's awesome, I love working out too!
Me too, it's so important to take care of your body.
I agree, I try to work out at least 3 times a week.
That's great, what do you like to do?
I like to run, lift weights, and do yoga.
I love running too, it's so peaceful.
I know right? It's like the only time I can really clear my head.
I'm glad you're a personal trainer, you're really helping me motivate me to work out more.
I'm glad to hear that! I love seeing my clients reach their goals.
Well, I better get going, I have to work.
